content.issue: The heading is too generic and doesn't clearly communicate the specific value proposition or differentiation from competitors
content.recommendation: Make it more specific: 'Build Enterprise-Grade RAG Systems in Minutes, Not Months'
variants: Build Enterprise-Grade RAG Systems in Minutes, Not Months
Deploy Production-Ready RAG Applications in Days, Not Quarters
Create Reliable RAG Systems 10x Faster Than Custom Development

content.issue: The CTA is generic and doesn't create urgency or communicate value
content.recommendation: Make it more value-oriented: 'Start Building for Free' or 'Deploy Your First RAG in 10 Minutes'
variants: Deploy Your First RAG in 10 Minutes

content.content: Trag simplifies RAG stack development for production use cases.
content.issue: The value proposition is too technical and focuses on the tool rather than outcomes for the user
content.recommendation: Reframe around benefits: 'Deploy production-ready RAG applications in days, not months - without massive engineering teams'
variants: Deploy production-ready RAG applications in days, not months - without massive engineering teams
Build enterprise RAG systems in 80% less time with 50% fewer resources
Get RAG to production in days, not months, with your existing team

content.issue: The heading is too generic and doesn't communicate the unique benefits
content.recommendation: Change to a benefit-oriented heading: 'Everything You Need for Enterprise RAG'
variants: Everything You Need for Enterprise RAG
The Complete RAG Platform for Production Applications

content.issue: The plan names are generic and don't communicate value or appropriate use cases
content.recommendation: Rename plans to be more descriptive of use cases: 'Developer Sandbox / Team Deployment / Enterprise Scale'
